children.value: This post shows you markdown features that I’ve integrated into this site.
Automatically spans out to fit the table content:
The port this service listen on
Host name of the PostgreSQL instance
Environment indication for development, debugging and deployment and to make this line loooonger
#TODO feature image or table by enlarging it outside the reading width
A normal image will always fit within the reading line width.
A “feature-sm” image will stick out a bit.
A “feature-lg” image will take almost the whole screen.

creates image with multiple sizes for different
screen resolutions. If the image path starts with

, it will be relative with
the
file. Otherwise, it will look for images inside the
